patthana2.13:1.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.13:2.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:3.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:3.1_1: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo
patthana2.13:4.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nadassanena
patthana2.13:4.1_1: pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe
patthana2.13:4.1_2: …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe….
patthana2.13:5.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:5.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca
patthana2.13:6.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte
patthana2.13:6.1_1: pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme
patthana2.13:6.1_2: pañca, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana2.13:7.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:8.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:8.1_1: nadassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… (yāva asaññasattā)
patthana2.13:9.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare
patthana2.13:9.1_1: tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca,
patthana2.13:9.1_2: naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne
patthana2.13:9.1_3: ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:11.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.13:12.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nadassanena
patthana2.13:12.1_1: pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe
patthana2.13:12.1_2: …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… (yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā) vatthuṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā.
patthana2.13:13.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā.
patthana2.13:14.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo ca nadassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:14.1_1: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā, mahābhūte
patthana2.13:15.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:15.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā
patthana2.13:16.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:16.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā
patthana2.13:17.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:17.1_1: ca nadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—dassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.13:17.1_2: khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe ca …pe… dassanena pahātabbe
patthana2.13:17.1_3: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:18.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:19.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:20.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:20.1_1: nadassanena pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ
patthana2.13:20.1_2: …pe… dve khandhe …pe… (yāva asaññasattā) cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:20.1_3: kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā kāyaviññāṇaṁ; vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā,
patthana2.13:20.1_4: uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho, vatthuṁ paccayā uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:21.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:22.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:22.1_1: dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vatthuñca paccayā vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:23.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare
patthana2.13:23.1_1: tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava,
patthana2.13:23.1_2: naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne
patthana2.13:23.1_3: ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:25.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:26.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:27.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve, (sabbattha dve) vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana2.13:29.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe saṁsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato moho.
patthana2.13:30.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ saṁsaṭṭho nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:31.1: Nahetuyā dve, naadhipatiyā dve, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte dve, naāsevane dve, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, navippayutte dve.
patthana2.13:33.1: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sampayuttavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:34.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:35.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nadassanena
patthana2.13:35.1_1: pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena
patthana2.13:36.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dassanena
patthana2.13:36.1_1: pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana2.13:36.1_2: diṭṭhi …pe… vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati; dassanena
patthana2.13:36.1_3: pahātabbaṁ diṭṭhiṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana2.13:36.1_4: diṭṭhi …pe… vicikicchā …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati; vicikicchaṁ ārabbha vicikicchā
patthana2.13:36.1_5: uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati; dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha
patthana2.13:36.1_6: dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati.
patthana2.13:37.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā
patthana2.13:37.1_1: dassanena pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe …pe… dassanena
patthana2.13:37.1_2: pahātabbe khandhe aniccato …pe… vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena dassanena pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa
patthana2.13:37.1_3: cittaṁ jānāti, dassanena pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana2.13:38.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana2.13:38.1_1: paccayo—dānaṁ …pe… sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:38.1_2: taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati; uddhaccaṁ …pe… nadassanena pahātabbaṁ
patthana2.13:38.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe… jhānā …pe… ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ
patthana2.13:38.1_4: paccavekkhanti …pe… phalassa āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; ariyā nadassanena
patthana2.13:38.1_5: pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe… pubbe …pe… cakkhuṁ
patthana2.13:38.1_6: …pe… vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbe khandhe aniccato …pe… vipassati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:38.1_7: taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ …pe… nadassanena pahātabbaṁ
patthana2.13:38.1_8: domanassaṁ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya
patthana2.13:39.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ
patthana2.13:39.1_1: …pe… sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ …pe… pubbe …pe… jhānā …pe… cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ nadassanena
patthana2.13:39.1_2: pahātabbe khandhe assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana2.13:39.1_3: diṭṭhi …pe… vicikicchā …pe… dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana2.13:40.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana2.13:40.1_1: sahajātādhipati. Ārammaṇādhipati—dassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti
patthana2.13:40.1_2: abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati,
patthana2.13:40.1_3: diṭṭhiṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…. Sahajātādhipati—dassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.13:41.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:41.1_1: Sahajātādhipati—dassanena pahātabbādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:42.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa ca nadassanena pahātabbassa ca
patthana2.13:42.1_1: dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātādhipati—dassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.13:43.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena
patthana2.13:43.1_2: …pe… pubbe …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:43.1_3: taṁ garuṁ katvā nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ
patthana2.13:43.1_4: garuṁ katvā …pe… phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ nadassanena
patthana2.13:43.1_5: pahātabbe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā nadassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:43.1_6: rāgo uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—nadassanena pahātabbādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana2.13:44.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:44.1_1: Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ datvā …pe… jhānaṁ …pe… cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ nadassanena pahātabbe
patthana2.13:44.1_2: khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā dassanena pahātabbo rāgo
patthana2.13:45.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā
patthana2.13:45.1_1: purimā dassanena pahātabbā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ dassanena pahātabbānaṁ
patthana2.13:46.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—dassanena
patthana2.13:46.1_1: pahātabbā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā
patthana2.13:46.1_2: purimā nadassanena pahātabbā khandhā …pe… phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:46.1_3: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Āvajjanā dassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:47.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pañca … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:48.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.13:48.1_2: upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; dassanena pahātabbaṁ dosaṁ … mohaṁ
patthana2.13:48.1_3: … diṭṭhiṁ … patthanaṁ upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; dassanena pahātabbo
patthana2.13:48.1_4: rāgo …pe… patthanā dassanena pahātabbassa rāgassa …pe… patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:49.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:49.1_2: rāgaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti dassanena pahātabbaṁ dosaṁ …
patthana2.13:49.1_3: mohaṁ … diṭṭhiṁ … patthanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti; dassanena
patthana2.13:49.1_4: pahātabbo rāgo …pe… patthanā saddhāya …pe… paññāya … nadassanena pahātabbassa rāgassa
patthana2.13:49.1_5: … dosassa … mohassa … mānassa … patthanāya … kāyikassa sukhassa …pe… phalasamāpattiyā
patthana2.13:50.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:50.1_2: upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti; sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ,
patthana2.13:50.1_3: nadassanena pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ … patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ
patthana2.13:50.1_4: …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti; saddhā
patthana2.13:50.1_5: …pe… paññā, nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo …pe… patthanā … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ
patthana2.13:50.1_6: saddhāya …pe… paññāya nadassanena pahātabbassa rāgassa …pe… patthanāya … kāyikassa
patthana2.13:50.1_7: sukhassa … kāyikassa dukkhassa … maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:51.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:51.1_2: upanissāya diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ upanissāya diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti, nadassanena
patthana2.13:51.1_3: pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ … dosaṁ … mohaṁ … mānaṁ … patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ
patthana2.13:51.1_4: upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ dassanena pahātabbassa
patthana2.13:51.1_5: rāgassa … dosassa … mohassa … diṭṭhiyā … patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:52.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena
patthana2.13:52.1_2: aniccato …pe… vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nadassanena pahātabbo rāgo
patthana2.13:52.1_3: …pe… uddhaccaṁ …pe… nadassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā
patthana2.13:52.1_4: rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti. Rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana2.13:52.1_6: …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu nadassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:53.1_0: Nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:53.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ

patthana2.13:53.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu dassanena pahātabbānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:54.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nadassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana2.13:65.1_2: dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe….

patthana2.13:67.1_1: atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—dassanena

patthana2.13:108.1_2: rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Nānākkhaṇikā—nabhāvanāya pahātabbā

patthana2.13:198.1_1: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nadassanena
patthana2.13:198.1_2: pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:198.1_3: purejātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo dassanena pahātabbahetukassa
patthana2.13:198.1_4: ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:199.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā dassanena pahātabbahetukassa
patthana2.13:199.1_1: dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. Sahajāto—dassanena pahātabbahetuko
patthana2.13:199.1_2: eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā
patthana2.13:199.1_3: ca …pe… vicikicchāsahagato eko khandho ca moho ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana2.13:200.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbahetuko ca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko ca dhammā nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa
patthana2.13:200.1_1: dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana2.13:201.1_1: ca nadassanena pahātabbahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:202.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:203.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte
patthana2.13:203.1_1: nava, aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi,
patthana2.13:203.1_2: āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri,
patthana2.13:203.1_3: magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

patthana2.13:207.1: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
patthana2.13:208.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha,
patthana2.13:208.1_1: naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha …pe… nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
patthana2.13:209.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā) …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:211.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati
patthana2.13:211.1_1: hetupaccayā—bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
patthana2.13:212.1_0: (Evaṁ paṭiccavāropi sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi
patthana2.13:212.1_1: dassanena pahātabbahetukadukasadisā. Uddhaccasahagato moho vicikicchāsahagatamohaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbo.)
patthana2.13:213.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cha …pe…. (Dassanena pahātabbahetukadukasadisā.)
patthana2.13:214.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Ārabbha dassanena pahātabbahetukadukasadisā.)
patthana2.13:215.1_0: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana2.13:215.1_1: paccayo—dānaṁ …pe… sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati assādeti abhinandati,

patthana2.13:215.1_3: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe… jhānā …pe…
patthana2.13:215.1_4: ariyā maggā …pe… phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; ariyā nabhāvanāya
patthana2.13:215.1_5: pahātabbahetuke pahīne kilese …pe… pubbe samudāciṇṇe …pe… cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya
patthana2.13:215.1_6: pahātabbahetuke khandhe ca mohañca aniccato …pe… vipassati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:215.1_7: taṁ ārabbha nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe… vicikicchā …pe…
patthana2.13:215.1_8: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati
patthana2.13:215.1_9: …pe… anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya, mohassa ca ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:216.1_1: paccayo—dānaṁ …pe… sīlaṁ …pe… jhānaṁ …pe… cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuke

patthana2.13:216.1_3: uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ …pe… bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.

patthana2.13:224.1_2: pahātabbahetukā khandhā bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukānaṁ khandhānaṁ upanissayapaccayena

patthana2.13:224.1_4: khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo; sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgo parabhaṇḍe
patthana2.13:224.1_5: chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; sakapariggahe chandarāgo parapariggahe

patthana2.13:224.1_7: khandhā uddhaccasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:280.1_5: katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā
patthana2.13:281.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:281.1_2: vuṭṭhahitvā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,

patthana2.13:281.1_4: paccayo; cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ avitakke khandhe ca vitakkañca garuṁ katvā assādeti

patthana2.13:294.1_5: samāpattiṁ uppādeti; avitakkā saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ vitakko ca avitakkāya saddhāya
patthana2.13:294.1_6: …pe… paññāya … kāyikassa sukhassa … kāyikassa dukkhassa … avitakkassa maggassa …

patthana2.13:295.1_4: dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; avitakkā
patthana2.13:295.1_5: saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ vitakko ca savitakkāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya … rāgassa …pe…
patthana2.13:295.1_6: patthanāya savitakkassa maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:296.1_1: saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… (dutiyavāre likhitapadā sabbe kātabbā) samāpattiṁ
patthana2.13:296.1_2: uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ vitakkaṁ

patthana2.13:296.1_4: senāsanaṁ vitakko ca savitakkāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya … rāgassa …pe… patthanāya
patthana2.13:296.1_5: savitakkassa maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā vitakkassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:297.1_3: paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ

patthana2.13:299.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… vipassati assādeti
patthana2.13:299.1_2: abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha savitakkā khandhā uppajjanti. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu savitakkānaṁ
patthana2.13:300.1_0: Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:300.1_2: assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca uppajjanti. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu
patthana2.13:300.1_3: savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa ca purejātapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:302.1_2: …pe…. Nānākkhaṇikā—savitakkā cetanā vipākānaṁ savitakkānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena

patthana2.13:304.1: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:305.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:305.1_1: pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena
patthana2.13:305.1_2: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa
patthana2.13:305.1_3: ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. Sahajātaṁ—paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:305.1_4: vatthu vitakkassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—vatthu
patthana2.13:306.1: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā avitakkassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:307.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Ekaṁ, paṭiccasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.13:307.1_1: Savitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana2.13:307.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena
patthana2.13:308.1_0: Avitakko dhammo avitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:308.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa
patthana2.13:308.1_2: atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Avitakko dhammo savitakkassa
patthana2.13:308.1_3: ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. Sahajāto—vitakko
patthana2.13:308.1_4: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:308.1_5: vitakko sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo, paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:308.1_6: vatthu vitakkassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ
patthana2.13:308.1_7: …pe… vatthuṁ aniccato …pe… vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha vitakko ca
patthana2.13:308.1_8: sampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti, vatthu vitakkassa sampayuttakānañca khandhānaṁ

patthana2.13:309.1_1: purejātaṁ. Sahajāto—savitakko eko khandho ca vitakko ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana2.13:309.1_2: paccayo …pe… dve khandhā ca …pe…. Sahajāto—savitakko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ

patthana2.13:310.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā avitakkassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:310.1_1: purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca
patthana2.13:310.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātā—savitakkā khandhā ca
patthana2.13:310.1_3: vatthu ca vitakkassa atthipaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhikkhaṇe, tīṇi). Pacchājātā—savitakkā
patthana2.13:310.1_4: khandhā ca vitakko ca purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—savitakkā
patthana2.13:310.1_5: khandhā ca vitakko ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:310.1_6: Pacchājātā—savitakkā khandhā ca vitakko ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:311.1_0: Savitakko ca avitakko ca dhammā savitakkassa ca avitakkassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena
patthana2.13:311.1_1: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. Sahajāto—savitakko eko khandho ca vitakko ca tiṇṇannaṁ
patthana2.13:311.1_2: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā ca
patthana2.13:311.1_3: …pe…. Sahajāto—savitakko eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vitakkassa
patthana2.13:311.1_4: ca atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… dve khandhā ca …pe…. (Paṭisandhiyāpi dve.)
patthana2.13:312.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:313.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana2.13:313.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana2.13:313.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne
patthana2.13:313.1_3: nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava,
patthana2.13:315.1_0: Savitakko dhammo savitakkassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena

patthana2.13:389.1_0: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:389.1_1: nasukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:389.1_2: dve khandhe …pe… ahetukaṁ sukhaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:389.1_3: nasukhasahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe
patthana2.13:389.1_4: …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…. (Yāva
patthana2.13:389.1_5: asaññasattā) Vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato
patthana2.13:389.1_6: uddhaccasahagato moho. (Yathā sappītike nahetupaccayasadisaṁ, ninnānaṁ sabbatthameva nava pañhā.)
patthana2.13:390.1_0: Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte
patthana2.13:390.1_1: nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ,
patthana2.13:390.1_2: najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:392.1_0: (Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā. Paccayavāre pavattipi
patthana2.13:392.1_1: paṭisandhipi vitthāretabbā, yathā sappītikadukapaccayavārapaccanīyepi pavatte vatthu
patthana2.13:392.1_2: ca vitthāretabbaṁ, yathā sappītikaduke ekoyeva moho, evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi
patthana2.13:392.1_3: saṁsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi yathā sappītikadukaṁ, evaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
patthana2.13:393.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cattāri. (Ārammaṇepi adhipatiyāpi sappītikadukasadisā, sukhanti nānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.13:394.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā
patthana2.13:394.1_1: purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana2.13:394.1_2: anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā
patthana2.13:394.1_3: pacchimassa pacchimassa sukhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sukhasahagataṁ cuticittaṁ
patthana2.13:394.1_4: nasukhasahagatassa upapatticittassa … sukhasahagataṁ bhavaṅgaṁ āvajjanāya … sukhasahagataṁ
patthana2.13:394.1_6: … sukhasahagataṁ bhavaṅgaṁ nasukhasahagatassa bhavaṅgassa … sukhasahagataṁ kusalākusalaṁ
patthana2.13:394.1_7: nasukhasahagatassa vuṭṭhānassa … kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa … phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena
patthana2.13:394.1_8: paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ
patthana2.13:394.1_9: sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ sukhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:395.1: Nasukhasahagato dhammo nasukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— purimā purimā nasukhasahagatā …pe….
patthana2.13:396.1_0: Sukhasahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
patthana2.13:396.1_1: paccayo—purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā ca sukhañca pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ
patthana2.13:396.1_2: khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā
patthana2.13:396.1_3: khandhā ca sukhañca pacchimassa pacchimassa sukhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; sukhasahagataṁ
patthana2.13:396.1_4: cuticittañca sukhañca nasukhasahagatassa upapatticittassa … sukhasahagataṁ bhavaṅgañca
patthana2.13:396.1_5: sukhañca āvajjanāya … sukhasahagataṁ kāyaviññāṇañca sukhañca vipākamanodhātuyā …
patthana2.13:396.1_6: sukhasahagatā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ca sukhañca kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā … sukhasahagataṁ
patthana2.13:396.1_7: bhavaṅgañca sukhañca nasukhasahagatassa bhavaṅgassa … sukhasahagataṁ kusalākusalañca
patthana2.13:396.1_8: sukhañca nasukhasahagatassa vuṭṭhānassa … kiriyaṁ vuṭṭhānassa … phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa
patthana2.13:396.1_9: anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Purimā purimā sukhasahagatā khandhā
patthana2.13:396.1_10: ca sukhañca pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ sukhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:397.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:398.1: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:399.1_0: Nasukhasahagato dhammo nasukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.13:399.1_2: upanissāya nasukhasahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti,
patthana2.13:399.1_3: mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; nasukhasahagataṁ sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ
patthana2.13:399.1_4: … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … utuṁ … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ sukhaṁ upanissāya
patthana2.13:399.1_5: nasukhasahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, pāṇaṁ hanati …pe…
patthana2.13:399.1_6: saṅghaṁ bhindati; nasukhasahagatā saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ sukhañca nasukhasahagatāya
patthana2.13:399.1_7: saddhāya …pe… paññāya … rāgassa … dosassa …pe… patthanāya … kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa
patthana2.13:399.1_8: dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā sukhassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:400.1_0: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.13:400.1_2: upanissāya sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti,
patthana2.13:400.1_3: diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; nasukhasahagataṁ sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ
patthana2.13:400.1_4: sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … utuṁ … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ sukhaṁ upanissāya sukhasahagatena
patthana2.13:400.1_5: cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti; sukhasahagatena cittena adinnaṁ ādiyati;
patthana2.13:400.1_6: musā …pe… pisuṇaṁ …pe… samphaṁ …pe… sandhiṁ …pe… nillopaṁ …pe… ekāgārikaṁ …pe… paripanthe
patthana2.13:400.1_7: …pe… paradāraṁ …pe… gāmaghātaṁ …pe… nigamaghātaṁ karoti; nasukhasahagatā saddhā …pe…
patthana2.13:400.1_8: senāsanaṁ sukhañca sukhasahagatāya saddhāya …pe… paññāya … rāgassa … mānassa … diṭṭhiyā
patthana2.13:400.1_9: … patthanāya … kāyikassa sukhassa … maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:401.1_0: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa ca nasukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:401.1_2: saddhaṁ upanissāya sukhasahagatena cittena dānaṁ deti …pe… (dutiyagamanasadisaṁ)
patthana2.13:401.1_3: mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; nasukhasahagataṁ sīlaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ sukhaṁ upanissāya
patthana2.13:401.1_4: dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, sukhasahagatena cittena adinnaṁ ādiyati …pe…
patthana2.13:401.1_5: nasukhasahagatā saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ sukhañca sukhasahagatāya … saddhāya …pe… patthanāya
patthana2.13:401.1_6: … kāyikassa sukhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā sukhassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:402.1: Sukhasahagato ca nasukhasahagato ca dhammā sukhasahagatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.13:403.1_0: Nasukhasahagato dhammo nasukhasahagatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:403.1_2: aniccato …pe… vipassati assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha nasukhasahagato rāgo uppajjati
patthana2.13:403.1_3: …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, sukhaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati …pe…
patthana2.13:403.1_5: …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ kāyaviññāṇassa …pe… vatthu nasukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ sukhassa
patthana2.13:404.1_0: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:404.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. Ārammaṇapurejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato
patthana2.13:404.1_2: …pe… vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha sukhasahagato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
patthana2.13:404.1_3: uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu sukhasahagatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:405.1_0: Nasukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa ca nasukhasahagatassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena
patthana2.13:405.1_2: sukhasahagatena cittena aniccato …pe… vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha
patthana2.13:405.1_3: sukhañca sampayuttakā khandhā ca uppajjanti. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu sukhasahagatānaṁ
patthana2.13:406.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … nava.
patthana2.13:407.1_0: Sukhasahagato dhammo sukhasahagatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo— sahajātā,
patthana2.13:407.1_1: nānākkhaṇikā. (Cha kammāni cattāri sahajātāpi nānākkhaṇikāpi kātabbā, dve nānākkhaṇikā.)
patthana2.13:407.1_2: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … nava … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena
patthana2.13:407.1_3: paccayo … nava … jhānapaccayena paccayo … nava … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri
patthana2.13:407.1_4: … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … cha … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … pañca … atthipaccayena
patthana2.13:407.1_5: paccayo … nava … natthipaccayena paccayo … nava … vigatapaccayena paccayo … nava
patthana2.13:408.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana2.13:408.1_1: sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte
patthana2.13:408.1_2: tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cha, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye nava, jhāne nava,
patthana2.13:408.1_3: magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
patthana2.13:409.1: (Evaṁ paccanīyavibhaṅgopi gaṇanāpi sappītikadukasadisaṁ kātabbaṁ, yadipi vimati atthi anulomaṁ passitvā gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana2.13:411.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— upekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana2.13:411.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… upekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana2.13:411.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upekkhāsahagate khandhe
patthana2.13:411.1_3: paṭicca upekkhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Upekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana2.13:411.1_4: dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana2.13:411.1_5: upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā upekkhā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca
patthana2.13:412.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—naupekkhāsahagataṁ
patthana2.13:412.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe…
patthana2.13:412.1_2: upekkhaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe naupekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.13:412.1_3: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:412.1_4: upekkhaṁ paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā, upekkhaṁ
patthana2.13:412.1_5: paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca upekkhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…. (Sappītikadukasadisaṁ,
patthana2.13:413.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte cha, āsevane cha, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana2.13:414.1_0: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:414.1_1: upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:414.1_2: …pe… vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato
patthana2.13:414.1_3: moho. Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke
patthana2.13:414.1_4: upekkhāsahagate khandhe paṭicca upekkhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:414.1_5: …pe…. Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā
patthana2.13:414.1_6: uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca dve khandhā
patthana2.13:414.1_7: upekkhā ca cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ, dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe….
patthana2.13:415.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:415.1_1: naupekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:415.1_2: dve khandhe …pe… ahetukaṁ upekkhaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:415.1_3: …pe… upekkhaṁ paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca upekkhā, ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…. (Yāva asaññasattā.)
patthana2.13:416.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ
patthana2.13:416.1_1: upekkhaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā
patthana2.13:416.1_2: khandhā; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagatā khandhā; vicikicchāsahagataṁ
patthana2.13:416.1_3: uddhaccasahagataṁ upekkhaṁ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:417.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato ca naupekkhāsahagato ca dhammā
patthana2.13:417.1_1: uppajjanti nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ upekkhaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
patthana2.13:417.1_2: rūpaṁ, ahetukaṁ upekkhaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.13:417.1_3: rūpaṁ; ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ,
patthana2.13:417.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā, mahābhūte paṭicca
patthana2.13:417.1_5: kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagatā khandhā, mahābhūte
patthana2.13:417.1_6: paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ, ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṁ paṭicca upekkhā ca sampayuttakā ca khandhā.
patthana2.13:418.1_0: Upekkhāsahagatañca naupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati
patthana2.13:418.1_1: nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca upekkhañca paṭicca dve khandhā,
patthana2.13:418.1_2: dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ khandhañca upekkhañca
patthana2.13:418.1_3: paṭicca dve khandhā, dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.13:418.1_4: khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca dve khandhā; dve khandhe …pe… vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate
patthana2.13:418.1_5: khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:419.1_0: Upekkhāsahagatañca naupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo
patthana2.13:419.1_1: uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetuke upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ
patthana2.13:419.1_2: rūpaṁ, ahetuke upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ;
patthana2.13:419.1_3: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca upekkhañca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,
patthana2.13:419.1_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagate khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṁ,

patthana2.13:513.1_1: purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa
patthana2.13:513.1_3: vatthu nakāmāvacarānaṁ khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—vatthu nakāmāvacarānaṁ
patthana2.13:514.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:514.1_1: pacchājātaṁ. Sahajātā—nakāmāvacarā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena
patthana2.13:514.1_2: paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Pacchājātā—nakāmāvacarā khandhā purejātassa imassa
patthana2.13:515.1_0: Kāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:515.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa

patthana2.13:515.1_3: khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Purejātaṁ—dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati …pe…. (Purejātasadisaṁ.)
patthana2.13:516.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ.

patthana2.13:516.1_2: pacchājātaṁ (vippayuttasadisaṁ). Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa ca nakāmāvacarassa
patthana2.13:517.1_0: Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā kāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:517.1_1: pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—nakāmāvacarā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ
patthana2.13:517.1_2: rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Pacchājātā—nakāmāvacarā khandhā
patthana2.13:517.1_3: ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—nakāmāvacarā
patthana2.13:517.1_4: khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Kāmāvacaro
patthana2.13:517.1_5: ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:517.1_6: purejātaṁ. Sahajāto—nakāmāvacaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena
patthana2.13:518.1: Natthipaccayena paccayo … vigatapaccayena paccayo … avigatapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:519.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare cattāri, samanantare
patthana2.13:519.1_1: cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte
patthana2.13:519.1_2: dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane tīṇi, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre cattāri,
patthana2.13:519.1_3: indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā
patthana2.13:519.1_4: satta, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.

patthana2.13:520.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:520.1_3: Kāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.13:521.1_0: Nakāmāvacaro dhammo nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.13:521.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa dhammassa
patthana2.13:521.1_2: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo
patthana2.13:521.1_3: … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. Nakāmāvacaro dhammo kāmāvacarassa
patthana2.13:521.1_4: ca nakāmāvacarassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:522.1_1: āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Kāmāvacaro ca nakāmāvacaro ca dhammā nakāmāvacarassa dhammassa

patthana2.13:523.1_1: satta, na sahajāte cha, naaññamaññe cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte
patthana2.13:523.1_2: cha …pe… nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pañca, noatthiyā pañca, nonatthiyā satta,
patthana2.13:524.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare cattāri, nasamanantare
patthana2.13:524.1_1: cattāri, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe… nasampayutte dve, navippayutte
patthana2.13:525.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomamātikā kātabbā) …pe… avigate satta.

patthana2.13:528.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe…. Narūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpāvacaro

patthana2.13:536.1_3: paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe…. Rūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca

patthana2.13:700.1_1: khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena

patthana2.13:700.1_3: kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—niyyānikā cetanā phalassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:700.1_4: (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Niyyānikā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca
patthana2.13:701.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana2.13:701.1_1: Sahajātā(Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nānākkhaṇikā—aniyyānikā cetanā vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā
patthana2.13:701.1_2: ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo … vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁyeva … āhārapaccayena
patthana2.13:701.1_3: paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … jhānapaccayena paccayo …
patthana2.13:701.1_4: cattāri … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … dve …
patthana2.13:701.1_5: vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (arūpadukasadisā kātabbā) … atthipaccayena paccayo
patthana2.13:701.1_6: … satta (arūpadukasadisā kātabbā, āmasanā nānāpadāyeva) … natthipaccayena paccayo
patthana2.13:701.1_7: … tīṇi … vigatapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi … avigatapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:702.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi,
patthana2.13:702.1_1: sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, pacchājāte
patthana2.13:702.1_2: dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne
patthana2.13:702.1_3: cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā
patthana2.13:704.1_0: Niyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:704.1_1: paccayo. Niyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.13:704.1_2: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. Niyyāniko dhammo
patthana2.13:704.1_3: niyyānikassa ca aniyyānikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:705.1_0: Aniyyāniko dhammo aniyyānikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.13:705.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana2.13:705.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:705.1_3: Aniyyāniko dhammo niyyānikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:706.1: Niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā niyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. Niyyāniko ca aniyyāniko ca dhammā aniyyānikassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:707.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta,
patthana2.13:707.1_1: nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte
patthana2.13:707.1_2: cha, napacchājāte satta …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā
patthana2.13:707.1_3: cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:708.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri,
patthana2.13:708.1_1: naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe… nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā
patthana2.13:709.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.13:711.1_0: Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca niyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—niyataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.13:711.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe…. Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato dhammo
patthana2.13:711.1_2: uppajjati hetupaccayā—niyate khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana2.13:712.1: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … cattāri. (Niyyānikadukasadisā ninnānākaraṇā.)
patthana2.13:713.1_0: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana2.13:713.1_1: maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, niyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe …pe…
patthana2.13:713.1_2: niyate khandhe aniccato …pe… vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena niyatacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ
patthana2.13:713.1_3: jānāti, niyatā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa,
patthana2.13:714.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe…
patthana2.13:714.1_1: uposathakammaṁ …pe… pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe… jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ paccavekkhati assādeti
patthana2.13:714.1_2: abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi …pe… vicikicchā …pe… uddhaccaṁ
patthana2.13:714.1_3: …pe… aniyataṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, ariyā phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana2.13:714.1_4: nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:714.1_5: ariyā aniyate pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese …pe… pubbe samudāciṇṇe
patthana2.13:714.1_6: …pe… cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniyate khandhe aniccato …pe… vipassati assādeti abhinandati,
patthana2.13:714.1_7: taṁ ārabbha aniyato rāgo …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati
patthana2.13:714.1_8: …pe… āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana2.13:714.1_9: paccayo; nibbānaṁ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo; rūpajīvitindriyaṁ mātughātikammassa
patthana2.13:714.1_11: paccayo; yaṁ vatthuṁ āmasantassa micchattaniyatā khandhā uppajjanti, taṁ vatthu micchattaniyatānaṁ
patthana2.13:715.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātādhipati—niyatādhipati
patthana2.13:715.1_1: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa
patthana2.13:715.1_3: maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti. Sahajātādhipati—niyatādhipati
patthana2.13:715.1_4: cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Niyato dhammo niyatassa ca
patthana2.13:715.1_5: aniyatassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Sahajātādhipati—niyatādhipati
patthana2.13:715.1_6: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:716.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana2.13:716.1_1: Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati
patthana2.13:716.1_2: assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati … diṭṭhi uppajjati;
patthana2.13:716.1_3: pubbe …pe… jhānā …pe… ariyā phalaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ garuṁ katvā
patthana2.13:716.1_4: paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:716.1_5: cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ aniyate khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ
patthana2.13:716.1_6: katvā aniyato rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. Sahajātādhipati—aniyatādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.13:716.1_7: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Aniyato dhammo
patthana2.13:716.1_8: niyatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—nibbānaṁ maggassa
patthana2.13:717.1: Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggo phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, niyatā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:718.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā aniyatā
patthana2.13:718.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ aniyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo;
patthana2.13:718.1_2: anulomaṁ gotrabhussa … anulomaṁ vodānassa … phalaṁ phalassa … anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā
patthana2.13:718.1_4: paccayo. Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—aniyataṁ domanassaṁ
patthana2.13:718.1_5: niyatassa domanassassa, aniyatā micchādiṭṭhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā anantarapaccayena
patthana2.13:718.1_6: paccayo; gotrabhu maggassa … vodānaṁ maggassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:719.1: Samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pañca … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … dve … nissayapaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana2.13:720.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Pakatūpanissayo—mātughātikammaṁ
patthana2.13:720.1_3: Paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa …pe… tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:720.1_4: paccayo. Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.13:720.1_6: …pe… saṅghaṁ bhinditvā tassa paṭighātatthāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ
patthana2.13:720.1_7: karoti, ariyā maggaṁ upanissāya anuppannaṁ samāpattiṁ uppādenti, uppannaṁ samāpajjanti
patthana2.13:720.1_8: …pe… ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; maggo phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:721.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.13:721.1_2: dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ karoti, jhānaṁ uppādeti, vipassanaṁ …pe… abhiññaṁ
patthana2.13:721.1_3: …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti … diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; aniyataṁ sīlaṁ …pe… paññaṁ
patthana2.13:721.1_4: … rāgaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ … kāyikaṁ sukhaṁ … kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ … utuṁ … bhojanaṁ … senāsanaṁ
patthana2.13:721.1_5: upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti, pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… nigamaghātaṁ karoti,
patthana2.13:721.1_6: aniyatā saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ aniyatāya saddhāya …pe… patthanāya … kāyikassa sukhassa
patthana2.13:722.1_0: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana2.13:722.1_2: mātaraṁ jīvitā voropeti …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; aniyataṁ dosaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya
patthana2.13:722.1_3: mātaraṁ jīvitā voropeti …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; aniyato rāgo … dosaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ
patthana2.13:722.1_5: maggassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa maggassa …pe… catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa
patthana2.13:723.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana2.13:723.1_1: vatthupurejātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena
patthana2.13:723.1_4: paccayo. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu niyatānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:724.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:725.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—niyatā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.13:725.1_1: khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena
patthana2.13:725.1_2: paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā—niyatā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ

patthana2.13:726.1: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:727.1_0: Vipākapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ … āhārapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … indriyapaccayena
patthana2.13:727.1_1: paccayo … cattāri … jhānapaccayena paccayo … cattāri … maggapaccayena paccayo … cattāri
patthana2.13:727.1_2: … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … dve … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi (arūpadukasadisaṁ)

patthana2.13:728.1_2: dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye jhāne cattāri,
patthana2.13:728.1_3: magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate
patthana2.13:729.1_0: Niyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:729.1_1: paccayo. Niyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.13:729.1_2: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena
patthana2.13:729.1_3: paccayo. Niyato dhammo niyatassa ca aniyatassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:730.1_0: Aniyato dhammo aniyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena
patthana2.13:730.1_1: paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena
patthana2.13:730.1_2: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:730.1_3: Aniyato dhammo niyatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena
patthana2.13:731.1: Niyato ca aniyato ca dhammā niyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. Niyato ca aniyato ca dhammā aniyatassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:732.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta,
patthana2.13:732.1_1: nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte
patthana2.13:732.1_2: cha, napacchājāte satta …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā
patthana2.13:732.1_3: cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:733.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri, naanantare nasamanantare cattāri,
patthana2.13:733.1_1: naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe… nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā
patthana2.13:734.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca (anulomamātikā vitthāretabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
patthana2.13:736.1_0: Sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sauttaraṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.13:736.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:736.1_2: …pe…. (Yāva ajjhattikā mahābhūtā. Yathā cūḷantaraduke lokiyadukasadisaṁ ninnānākaraṇaṁ.)
patthana2.13:738.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saraṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana2.13:738.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe…. (Pañca pañhā arūpāvacaradukasadisā, anulomapaṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.13:739.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana2.13:741.1: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana2.13:742.1_0: Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—ahetukaṁ araṇaṁ ekaṁ
patthana2.13:742.1_1: khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:743.1_0: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare
patthana2.13:743.1_1: tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte pañca,
patthana2.13:743.1_2: naāsevane pañca, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne
patthana2.13:743.1_3: ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:745.1: Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavāropi kātabbo.
patthana2.13:746.1: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—saraṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe …pe…. (Yathā arūpāvacaradukassa paccayavāropi evaṁ kātabbo.)
patthana2.13:747.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana2.13:749.1: Saraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.13:750.1_1: khandhaṁ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana2.13:750.1_2: …pe… (yāva asaññasattā) cakkhāyatanaṁ paccayā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ …pe… kāyāyatanaṁ paccayā
patthana2.13:750.1_3: kāyaviññāṇaṁ, vatthuṁ paccayā ahetukā khandhā. Araṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā saraṇo dhammo
patthana2.13:750.1_4: uppajjati nahetupaccayā— vatthuṁ paccayā vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana2.13:752.1_0: Nahetuyā cattāri, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi, nasamanantare
patthana2.13:752.1_1: tīṇi, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye tīṇi, napurejāte cattāri, napacchājāte nava,
patthana2.13:752.1_2: naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne
patthana2.13:752.1_3: ekaṁ, namagge ekaṁ, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
patthana2.13:754.1: (Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi nissayavāropi kātabbo, saṁsaṭṭhavārepi dve pañhā kātabbā sabbattha.)
patthana2.13:755.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve (sabbattha dve), vipāke ekaṁ, avigate dve. (Anulomaṁ.)

patthana2.13:758.1: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Arūpadukasadisaṁ, cattāri.)

patthana2.13:761.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

patthana2.13:762.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

patthana2.13:762.1_5: khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa
patthana2.13:762.1_6: dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇādhipati—dānaṁ …pe… sīlaṁ …pe… uposathakammaṁ
patthana2.13:762.1_7: katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati … diṭṭhi
patthana2.13:762.1_8: uppajjati; pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe… jhānā …pe… cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ, araṇe khandhe garuṁ
patthana2.13:762.1_9: katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati … diṭṭhi uppajjati.

patthana2.13:763.1_2: dhammo araṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—saraṇā khandhā vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:764.1_1: pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ araṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo; anulomaṁ gotrabhussa
patthana2.13:764.1_2: …pe… phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa

patthana2.13:766.1_2: …pe… saṅghaṁ bhindati; dosaṁ …pe… patthanaṁ upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ
patthana2.13:766.1_3: bhindati, rāgo …pe… patthanā rāgassa …pe… patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

patthana2.13:766.1_8: saddhāya …pe… paññāya … kāyikassa sukhassa … kāyikassa dukkhassa … maggassa … phalasamāpattiyā

patthana2.13:767.1_3: … senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti …pe… samāpattiṁ uppādeti; saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ
patthana2.13:767.1_4: saddhāya …pe… paññāya … kāyikassa sukhassa … kāyikassa dukkhassa … maggassa … phalasamāpattiyā

patthana2.13:768.1_2: jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti; sīlaṁ …pe… senāsanaṁ upanissāya pāṇaṁ hanati …pe… saṅghaṁ
patthana2.13:768.1_3: bhindati; saddhā …pe… senāsanaṁ rāgassa …pe… patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:769.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.

patthana2.13:769.1_2: rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…

patthana2.13:769.1_7: ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Vatthupurejātaṁ—vatthu saraṇānaṁ
patthana2.13:770.1: Pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … dve … āsevanapaccayena paccayo … dve.
patthana2.13:771.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana2.13:771.1_1: khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.) Sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā—saraṇā
patthana2.13:771.1_2: cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. Nānākkhaṇikā—saraṇā cetanā
patthana2.13:771.1_3: vipākānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo. (Mūlaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
patthana2.13:771.1_4: Saraṇā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:772.1: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā. Sahajātā—(Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana2.13:774.1_1: araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo
patthana2.13:774.1_2: dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana2.13:775.1_0: Araṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ,
patthana2.13:775.1_1: āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Araṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:775.1_2: Purejātaṁ—cakkhuṁ …pe… vatthuṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana2.13:775.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, vatthu saraṇānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.13:776.1_0: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā saraṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana2.13:776.1_1: purejātaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā araṇassa dhammassa atthipaccayena
patthana2.13:776.1_2: paccayo—sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ. Sahajātā—saraṇā khandhā ca mahābhūtā
patthana2.13:776.1_3: ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—saraṇā khandhā ca
patthana2.13:776.1_4: kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. Pacchājātā—saraṇā khandhā
patthana2.13:777.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri, samanantare
patthana2.13:777.1_1: cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte
patthana2.13:777.1_2: dve, pacchājāte dve, āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre cattāri, indriye
patthana2.13:777.1_3: cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā satta,
patthana2.13:777.1_4: natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate satta.
patthana2.13:778.1_0: Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo
patthana2.13:778.1_1: … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena

patthana2.13:778.1_3: paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo saraṇassa ca araṇassa ca dhammassa

patthana2.13:779.1_1: … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo

patthana2.13:779.1_3: dhammo saraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo
patthana2.13:780.1: Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā saraṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ. Saraṇo ca araṇo ca dhammā araṇassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana2.13:781.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare satta,
patthana2.13:781.1_1: nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, nanissaye pañca, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte
patthana2.13:781.1_2: cha, napacchājāte satta …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri, noatthiyā
patthana2.13:781.1_3: cattāri, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattāri.
patthana2.13:782.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri, naadhipatiyā cattāri …pe… nasamanantare cattāri,
patthana2.13:782.1_1: naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cattāri …pe… nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā
patthana2.13:783.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri (anulomamātikā gahetabbā) …pe… avigate satta.
